modName: Xian - The Dragon Lady - Blades Initiate
summary: Xian was a character I created a while ago to use as a Blades initiate. I was never really happy with her appearance until I tried her with zzjays included files under miscellaneous. Xian was my attempt at going for a classic Chinese female companion. Available in Calculated and Auto-Level versions. Happy Chinese New Year!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1360088355.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1360089938.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1362531155.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-2-1360092105.png[/img][/center]
[center]\"This mod is dependent on other mods for the outcome to achieve the same results as my screenshots. I use K ENB in my game\".[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente [/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea [/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella by BellaGail [/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26113]Better Females By Bella Natural Edition by zzjay[/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411]Brows by Hvergelmir[/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot aka Lograam[/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/108232]Direct link to ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_2 [/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24394]Body Imperfect by betterbecause[/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31047]Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK[/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21750]Chinese General Armor and weapon DV by Belfas-Adorn[/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14642]Neo Oriental Dress v1_20 CBBE UNP by Neovinci aka Meister[/center][/url]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1167]Pretty Lips by Danariel[/center][/url]

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-3-1360092106.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-4-1360092106.png[/img][/center]
author: FalmerBane

files.name: Xian - The Dragon Lady - Blades Initiate - Courtesan Essential
files.fileName: Xian - The Dragon Lady - Blades Initiate - Courtesan -31047-1-0.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Initial Release - Plus I just added an optional version that mirrors the main image. She wears traditional Chinese courtesan makeup versus the other version.
I added three Assassin versions of Xian by request. She prefers light armor and her sneak will rise to 100 with yours.
